name: QuarCade
tagline: Seven bite-size arcade games. Neon-fast. Offline friendly.
blurb: Mini-arcade with tight controls, adaptive speed ramps, and zero intrusive ads.
description: QuarCade is a pocket-sized arcade built for bursts of fun. Swap between handcrafted mini-games, climb a global tier ladder, and master buttery-smooth touch controls that feel great on phone or tablet.
